item.title: Linux Read Command
item.description: read 输入 用read 输入 读取 标准输出 或 文件。 -p 选项 弹出提示符。其他的参数会一次赋值。例如下： [root@host1-docker tmpdir]#read -p "Please input some things: " a b c Please input some things: aaa bbb ccc [root@host1-docker tmpdir]#echo $aaa [root@host1-docker tmpdir]#echo $a aaa [root@host1-docker tmpdir]#echo $b bbb [root@host1-docker tmpdir]#echo $c ccc -s 选项 用于密码 输入无回显，通常用于用户输入密码。 但是-s可能会导致下一个read在同行显示。 workaround: 单独echo一次即可，例如 read -s -p "Please input your name: " myname ; echo 匹配默认值，互交界面 #!/bin/bash - read -p "Please input your name: " myname read -p "Please input your email: " myemail while true do read -p "Display all information:[Y]/n" input case $input in [yY] | "") echo "Your name is $myname" echo "Your email address is $myemail" exit 0 ;; [nN]) echo "Okay.
